original_title: The Sights of Space - A Voyage to Spectacular Alien Worlds
overview: This short film is an interstellar road trip to the most amazing places we have discovered in our galaxy, as well as some stops to speculative worlds we think will exist, to see up close the wildest, weirdest destinations in the universe.
tagline: An interstellar road trip to the wildest places in the Milky Way.
title: The Sights of Space - A Voyage to Spectacular Alien Worlds
